taka0.text: Hi @!^You're the new farmer who owns that huge plot out of town, right? Look for me around town sometime, maybe we can become friends.
taka2.text: Hey there @!^We've started to become friends, so I decided to let you come into my trailer. Come by whenever you want!
taka4.text: Hi @!^We've become friends, so I decided that you should get to know me better.^I come from a place called Pitaya Island, in the Fern Island archipelago.
taka6.text: Hi @!^We've become friends, so I decided that you should get to know me better.^Taka isn't my actual name, just a shorter version of it. My full name is Kunitaka Ohkaze Kuromiya. I'm never gonna tell anyone my deadname though, so please don't ask about it.
taka8.text: Hi @!^We've become friends, so I decided that you should get to know me better.^I thought you should get to know my family a bit. There's my mom, her name's Michouki. There's also my dad, Genzaki. And then there's my siblings, Makouchi and Koni.
taka10p.text: You know @, we've become pretty close friends. I'm glad we've been able to spend time together.^I got you a gift I found while I was at the beach.
taka10d.text: Hi @!^You know, I'm glad we've started dating, you've been so nice to me. I hope I can move onto your farm soon!^Also, I got you a gift I found while I was at the beach.
taka10m.text:: Hi, my handsome husband!^Since we live together now, I decided to merge our savings. I love you! %item money 24000 24001
